name: Design Thinking
description: Human-centered approach to innovation that integrates user needs, technology possibilities, and business requirements

structure.name: Empathize
structure.description: Understand user needs, behaviors, and motivations through observation and engagement

structure.name: Define
structure.description: Clearly articulate the core problem and user needs based on empathy insights

structure.name: Ideate
structure.description: Generate a wide range of potential solutions through creative brainstorming

structure.name: Prototype
structure.description: Create low-fidelity representations to test ideas and gather feedback

structure.name: Test
structure.description: Validate solutions with real users and refine based on feedback

prompts: Who are we solving for and what do they truly need?
What patterns emerged from user research and observation?
What is the core problem we're trying to solve based on user insights?
How might we address this problem from multiple angles?
What's the simplest way to test our core assumptions?
What did we learn from user testing and how should we iterate?
What are the key insights that will guide our solution?
when_to_use: Service design and customer experience improvement
User research synthesis and insight generation
Process improvement focusing on user experience
when_not_to_use: Highly regulated environments requiring strict compliance

examples.title: Mobile App Redesign
examples.description: Using Design Thinking to completely redesign a mobile banking app based on user research

examples.title: Service Process Improvement
examples.description: Redesigning customer onboarding process through empathy mapping and prototyping

examples.title: Product Feature Innovation
examples.description: Developing new collaboration features through iterative testing with remote teams

validation_status.validation_notes: Proven methodology used by leading design firms and innovation labs worldwide

prerequisites: Access to users or user research data
Willingness to iterate based on feedback
Time for user testing and validation
